Name: butter production, from cow milk | buttermilk, from cow milk | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/105:Manufacture of dairy products/1050:Manufacture of dairy products
Description: A number of continuous techniques are available such as methods in which milk and later on cream is subjected to high speed churning and continuous working. The main steps of buttermaking are always the same.  ;Scheme of butter manufacture from cream (EU Commission, IPPC, 2006, Reference Document on Best Available Techniques in the Food, Drink and Milk Industries). This sheme does not include the previous step; milk to cream production, while this dataset does.
